prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: William C. Wooldridge papers, 1943-2022. Accession 53662. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Gift of William C. Wooldridge, Norfolk.

bioghist.head: Biographical Information
bioghist.p: William C. Wooldridge was born 24 February 1943 in Miami, Florida, to Clarence Edward Wooldridge (1912-2002) and Easter Souders Wooldridge (1912-1977). Clarence Wooldridge served in the miltary and the family lived in Pennsylvania, Ohio, and Kansas, before finally settling in Lynchburg, Virginia, where William Wooldridge graduated from E. C. Glass High School n 1961. He graduated from Harvard University in 1965 and did a year of post-graduate work at the University of St. Andrew's in Scotland. Wooldridge graduated from the University of Virginia law school in 1969, then entered the military, serving as a lawyer from 1969 to 1973. Wooldridge joined Norfolk and Western Railway Company as a lawyer in 1973, working at the company's Roanoke, Virginia, headquarters. When Norfolk and Western and Southern Railways merged to become Norfolk Southern, Wooldridge relocated to the new headquarters located in Norfolk, Virginia. He became vice president, law, in 1996 and retired in 2000. Wooldridge married Joyce Norton 15 June 1968 and they had two sons.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: Papers, 1943-2022, of William C. Wooldridge of Norfolk, Virginia, containing articles, birth announcements, birthday cards, brochures, Christmas cards, clippings, letters, memorandum, post cards, programs, report cards, reports, statements, and other documents concerning Wooldridge's family, friends, education, legal career, historical and genealogical research, map collecting, travel, and social activities. Collection is divided into two series: Series I: William C. Wooldridge business papers, 1973-2000; Series II: William C. Wooldridge correspondence, 1943-2022; Series III: Writings, 1960-2022.

list.item: Series I: William C. Wooldridge business papers, 1973-2000
Series II: William C. Wooldridge correspondence, 1943-2022

relatedmaterial.head: Related Material
relatedmaterial.p: William C. Wooldridge genealogical research papers, 1960-2015. Accession 51624. Personal papers collection, The Library of Virginia, Richmond, Virginia.

did.unittitle: List of files: Wooldridge business papers, 1973-2000 and Wooldridge correspondence, 1943-2022, 1943-2022.
Series I: William C. Wooldridge business papers, 1973-2000.

scopecontent.p: William C. Wooldridge business papers, 1973-2000, contain correspondence, memorandums, reports, statements, and other papers, concerning Wooldridge's career as an attorney for Norfolk and Western and Norfolk Southern railroads.

did.unittitle: Series II: William C. Wooldridge correspondence, 1943-2022.

scopecontent.p: William C. Wooldridge correspondence, 1943-2022, contain articles, birth announcements, birthday cards, brochures, Christmas card, clippings, letters, post cards, programs, report cards, and other documents. Papers detail Wooldridge's family life, his education, his career as a military lawyer, his career as a lawyer for Norfolk and Western and Norfolk Southern railroads, his interest in historical and genealogical research, his map collecting, and his and his family's travels.

did.unittitle: Correspondence, 1943-1954 (Florida; Willow Grove, Pennsylvania; Canton, Ohio; Olanthe, Kansas)
Correspondence--letters to Joyce Norton Wooldridge's parents, 1970-1972, 1974
Correspondence--Brunswick Forge Road, Inc. (Botetourt County, Va.), 1982 (1980-1985)
Correspondence--the Ehbauers regarding their daughters, exchange students who stayed with the Wooldridges, 1985-1987
Fort Norfolk Courier, Norfolk Historical Society, 1994-1995
Correspondence--promotion to vice president, Norfolk Southern's law department, 1996

scopecontent.p: Writings, 1960-2022, contain articles, book reviews, and poems written by William C. Wooldridge on economics, genealogy, history, maps, politics, and other topics. Also contains reviews of books written by Wooldridge. Also includes a volume of poems written by Easter Souders Wooldridge (1912-1977), arranged by William C. Wooldridge in 2022.
